name: It's Duel Time
description:
Recommended to play on PC

How to play:

Left click to Start > A timer will show up above

Guess the time as close as 0 and left click to confirm to enter "Dead Eye" mode.

The shooting accuracy is determined by how close you can get to 0, and if your guess goes below 0, the accuracy will be terrible. It is recommended to guess the time within 1 second for better accuracy.

When in "Dead Eye" mode, you will mark the locations that you want to hit.

Shooting different body parts will cause different amount of damage. Headshot = instant kill, Chest = 2 damage, limb = 1 damage

There are total of 6 levels

Level 1~3 enemy max health = 3,

Level 4~5 enemy max health = 1,

Level 6 enemy max health = 3 

There are more ideas on more levels, for example, save your friend from hanging by shooting the rope and different kind of enemy such as enemies on a minecart. 

And Versus mode!

Tips: If you find the game too difficult, try adjust your mouse sensitivity or play with a timer set to around 20 seconds.

Concept:

The game was designed in the mixture of Yu-Gi-Oh meme, Red Dead Redemption, and "The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly". I always wanted to make a cowboy duel game that is fair and challenging! I have modified the post processing value to reproduce a vintage movie feel.  And I am very happy that I am able to recreate the "Dead Eye" shooting system from Red Dead Redemption.

Asset used: buildings, guns, music and UI
